title._content: Ramos Mieja church, Buenis Aires Argentina

description._content:
Caption:  1965.  A remodeled old street car serves as the worship center for the new Mennonite mission outreach of the Ramos Mejia congregation in the greater Buenos Aires, Argentina area.  Attendance runs around 30.  Four of the families pictured from the Ramos Mejia church live near the new mission.  The 69-member Ramos Mejia congregation, formerly pastored by missionary Clyde Mosemann, will receive Mario Snyder as pastor on his return to Argentina.

Citation: Mennonite Board of Missions. Photographs. Argentina, 1942-1963. IV-10-7.2 Box 1 folder 34, photo #1. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana
